equipment.name: Temerity
base_affixes: Effects that Heal you beyond <text class='c_number'>150%</text> Life grant you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> up to <text class='c_random'>108.05%</text> of your Maximum Life that lasts for <text class='c_number'>12</text> seconds. Potions can be used while at full Life.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Heal +0.44 Life

equipment.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
base_affixes: When you pick up <text class='c_random'>7.5</text> <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text>, a free <text class='c_important'>Bone Spirit</text> is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.

equipment.name: Runic Gloves
base_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>67.32%</text> of normal damage.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Heal +0.44 Life
strikethrough_affixes: +18% Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies

equipment.name: Flickerstep
base_affixes: Each enemy you Evade through reduces your active Ultimate Cooldown by <text class='c_random'>4.32</text> seconds, up to <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Flammard
strikethrough_affixes: Skills deal up to <text class='c_random'>28.78%</text> increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Wave</text> fires two additional waves, each dealing <text class='c_random'>62.03%</text> less damage than the previous.

equipment.name: Band
base_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. Each additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>34.71%</text> of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.
+0.02 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently

equipment.name: Banished Lord's Talisman
base_affixes: After you spend <text class='c_number'>450</text> of your Primary Resource, your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill is guaranteed to <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text>. Your Critical Strikes that <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> deal <text class='c_random'>144.11%</text> increased damage.

equipment.name: Boneweave Helm
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a <text class='c_random'>43.49%</text> chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.43%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>5.6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>86.08%</text>.

equipment.name: Enigma Cube
strikethrough_affixes: You have <text class='c_random'>17.56%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance against <text class='c_important'><u>Injured</u></text> enemies. While you are <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, you gain <text class='c_random'>35.11%</text> increased Crowd Control Duration.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>24.36%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>8.4</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>48.72%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.
